overview: Krystal Steal is a beauty, an aspiring small town model, lured to the big city by the promise of fame and fortune in the house of style. Blinded by greed, drugs, deception and lies, beauty falls victim to just that ... her beauty ... and becomes a monster only she herself can destroy. Join Club Jenna's award-winning director Jim Enright on an erotic journey into the take-no-prisoners world of high fashion modeling. Where models are made on the catwalk and crash on the runway in the blink of a mascara'd eye.
title: Steal Runway
